title: United Kingdom court freezes Craig Wright’s assets
description: A United Kingdom court has given an order to freeze assets worth £6 million ($7.6 million) belonging to Craig Wright. This move was made to ensure that Wright is prevented from evading court expenses from his recent legal battle. Craig Wright was recently embroiled in a lawsuit against the Crypto Open Patent Alliance (COPA), claiming […]

title: Solana Foundation promises to  filter memecoin problems
description: The memecoin sector has been plagued with the introduction of tokens featuring offensive words. The issue was the center of discussions at the recent panel session held at the BUIDL Asia Summit in Seoul. Experts and investors alike including the Solana Foundation shared various possible solutions to the issue. Solana Foundation makes pledge against banned […]
